headline: Hasbro moves toys, board games headquarters to Boston
summary: Around 700 employees will transition from Rhode Island to Boston’s Seaport District by the end of 2026.

summary: Hasbro, Inc. (NASDAQ:HAS) ranks among the best performing S&P 500 stocks in the last 3 months. On August 26, Goldman Sachs reaffirmed a Buy rating and price target of $89 for Hasbro, Inc.
